attributes.action: Reduce fuel duty on petrol and diesel to help struggling families and businesses
attributes.additional_details:
Alot of families rely on thier vehicles to commute to work.
Many businesses fuel up vehicles to deliver or transport goods we all use every day.
Families are struggling with rising bills, we can't all afford the cost of an electric vehicle.
attributes.background: I request the government to consider reducing the fuel duty cost to help families and businesses struggling with rising energy costs.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/599089
